OOC: I don't know if I'm allowed to do this, but I'll assume I can.

IC:
AzureBlade: Computer, deploy repair equipment.

A massive nano-bot deployer unit lowered itself over Nightstrike. The 
nanobots went first to get him on repair mode so they could repair him 
after.

AzureBlade then adressed the autobots present.

AzureBlade: I will attempt to repair him enough to keep him intact 
until I can try to reconvert him again.

OOC: Airly, it's up to you to decide if I can procede and repair him.
